remarks: The base set of the binary structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsval.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsval.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsval.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsbas $p |- ( ph -> ( X X. Y ) = ( Base ` T ) ) $.
